title: ListUsers 3
source:
[[noinclude]]
[[div style="background: rgba(201,133,184,.4); box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #999; padding: .5em;"]]
ListUsers module for non-Wikidot users.

+ How to use?
> ##red|[[include component:listusers-1 users="."]]##
> @@##red|@@**%%name%%**@@##@@
> ##red|[[include component:listusers-2]]##
> @@##blue|@@**guest**@@##@@
> ##red|[[include component:listusers-3]]##

----
* https://scpfoundation.net/component:listusers-1
* https://scpfoundation.net/component:listusers-2
* @@https://scpfoundation.net/component:listusers-3@@
[[/div]]
----
[[/noinclude]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[module CSS]]
.textchange div.sitemember:nth-child(2) {
    display:none;
}
[[/module]]
